title: Lime and chilli monkfish tail with pea guacamole
description: Meaty monkfish carries these fresh and vibrant flavours brilliantly. It would be great cooked on a barbecue if the weather permits.
ingredients: salt and freshly ground black pepper
450g/1lb frozen petit pois or peas, defrosted and drained
1 red chilli, seeded and finely chopped
3 tomatoes, seeds removed and finely chopped
